General.Name: Shenglan Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenglan Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells electronic connectors, wire harness components, and precision components and parts in China and internationally. The company offers optical lenses, high and low voltage wires and cables, servo harnesses, harness assemblies, USB and FFC/FPC products, IO connectors, switches, power supply sockets, SAS backplane connectors, and new energy vehicle connectors, as well as wire-to-board, board-to-board, and wire-to-wire products. Its products are used in the consumer electronics, new energy vehicles, and other fields. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Dongguan, China.
